translations: adj.浮躁的；粗笨的；粗心的；愚蠢的
v.犯大错；笨手笨脚；摸索（blunder 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: Perhaps one day you will understand and forgive your blundering admirer.
sentences.translation: 也许有一天你会理解并且原谅我这个笨拙的爱慕者。

sentences.sentence: I think I was not mature, no way to own a blundering heart easily at the helm.
sentences.translation: 我想我还是不够成熟，没办法为自己那颗浮躁的心波澜不惊地掌舵。

sentences.sentence: In real life, the pure text and soft music, like a cold spring can always washing blundering heart.
sentences.translation: 现实生活中，纯净的文字和柔和的音乐，就象一股清泉总能洗涤浮躁的心灵。
